Package de.lases.business.service

Class ScientificForumService

java.lang.Object
de.lases.business.service.ScientificForumService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Dependent public class ScientificForumService extends Object implements Serializable
Provides functionality regarding the handling of scientific forums. In case of an unexpected state, a UIMessage event will be fired.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • getForum

      public ScientificForum getForum​(ScientificForum forum)
      Gets a scientific forum.
      Parameters:
      forum - A ScientificForum-DTO containing a valid id.
      Returns:
      The requested scientific forum.

    • updateForum

      public void updateForum​(ScientificForum newForum)
      Updates a scientific forum.
      Parameters:
      newForum - The new data of the scientific forum.

      Should contain a valid id.

    • addForum

      public void addForum​(ScientificForum forum, List<ScienceField> scienceFields, List<User> editors)
      Adds a scientific forum.

      All editors will be informed about being added to this forum, using the EmailUtil utility.

      Parameters:
      forum - The ScientificForum-DTO containing all necessary data.
      scienceFields - The scientific fields, which this forum is specialized in.
      editors - The editors of this forum.

    • removeForum

      public void removeForum​(ScientificForum forum)
      Deletes a scientific forum and all associated submissions and reviews.
      Parameters:
      forum - The scientific forum to be deleted.

    • addEditor

      public void addEditor​(User editor, ScientificForum forum)
      Adds an editor to a scientific forum.
      Parameters:
      editor - The user added as an editor.
      forum - The forum to which the editor is being added.

    • removeEditor

      public void removeEditor​(User editor, ScientificForum forum)
      Removes an editor from a scientific forum.
      Parameters:
      editor - The user removed as an editor.
      forum - The forum from which the editor is being removed.

    • addScienceField

      public void addScienceField​(ScienceField scienceField, ScientificForum forum)
      Adds a scientific field to a forum in which it has expertise.
      Parameters:
      scienceField - The scientific field of expertise.
      forum - The forum, which receives a new scientific field of expertise.

    • getEditors

      public List<User> getEditors​(ScientificForum forum)
      Gets all editors of a scientific forum.
      Parameters:
      forum - The forum where the editors are requested.
      Returns:
      All editors of the given forum.

    • getList

      public List<ScientificForum> getList​(ResultListParameters resultListParams)
      Gets all scientific forums.
      Parameters:
      resultListParams - The parameters, that control filtering and sorting of the resulting list.
      Returns:
      All scientific forums.
